title: Add greeting function with name parameter
description:
Add a Greet(name string) function to internal/testutil/hello.go that returns 'Hello, <name>!' and add TestGreet test cases:
- Greet('World') -> 'Hello, World!'
- Greet('Alice') -> 'Hello, Alice!'
- Greet('') -> 'Hello, !'

Test: go test ./internal/testutil/...
acceptance_criteria: go test ./internal/testutil/... passes with new test cases
closed_reason: Added Greet(name string) function to internal/testutil/hello.go that returns personalized greeting. Added TestGreet with table-driven tests covering World, Alice, and empty string cases.
